programme.title: Monster High

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Breaking Dad: Hank becomes Max and Phoebe's new science teacher. When he accidentally eats special turkey sandwiches that make him fall asleep, the twins must help him out. (S1, ep 20)

programme.title: The Thundermans

programme.title: Hunter Street

programme.title: Best & Bester

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: The Sharks are the toughest guys in town, but their next confrontation might be too much in 'Sharks vs. Pods', and then in 'CopyBob DittoPants', Plankton clones SpongeBob to steal the secret formula.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick think their homes have been sold, and move away, to Squidward's glee, in 'Sold!', and in 'Lame and Fortune', Plankton realises he can twist fortune cookies to suit his evil plot.

programme.title: Kamp Koral
programme.desc: SpongeBob, Patrick and Sandy decide to turn their cabin into a pirate ship in 'Camp Crossbones', then in 'A Jelly Life', SpongeBob pretends to be a jellyfish for research purposes. (S1, ep 17)

programme.title: Kamp Koral
programme.desc: Squidward is determined for his cabin to win the annual camp art competition in 'Painting with Squidward', then in 'Kamp Kow', The Kamp Koral campers befriend a cow with a big appetite. (S1, ep 19)

programme.desc: Adventures in Babysitting: Theodore gets roped into doing Alvin's babysitting sitting job with a spoiled four year old. (S4, ep 3a)

programme.desc: Mirror, Mirror on the Wall: While salmon fishing on the riverbank, Grizzy hauls in an unusual catch: an old hand mirror straight out of a fairy tale. (S1 Ep76)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy the Wizard: The Lemmings find a magic stick that makes objects come alive. Grizzy is sure the stick would save him a lot of work, the only problem is how to get it from the Lemmings. (S1 Ep77)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Moonwalk Bear: Grizzy tries to stop the Lemmings playing with fireworks. (S1 Ep78)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Pinata Regatta: Izzy can't bring herself to smash a pinata during Cinco de Mayo celebrations. But when that unsmashed pinata comes to life and spawns an evil pinata army, it's batter up. (S2 Ep13)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: A Dame-gerous Game: After Leshawna, Bridgette, Owen and Cody win a hide and seek contest, they're trapped on a private island by a jealous ex-champion and forced to play for their freedom. (S2 Ep14)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Royal Flush: When the other kids fear Harold has accidentally flushed himself down Chef's fancy new toilet, they travel into the sewer on a rescue mission. (S2 Ep15)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Total Eclipse Of The Fart: After accidentally swallowing her first loose tooth and fearing that means no cash under the pillow, Leshawna tries to capture the tooth fairy. (S2 Ep16)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Dissing Cousins - Part 1: It's International Cousins Day and Owen and Gwen are dreading the fact that their cousins Max and Ella are spending the day with them. (S2 Ep17)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Dissing Cousins - Part 1: It's International Cousins Day and Owen and Gwen are dreading the fact that their cousins Max and Ella are spending the day with them. (S2 Ep18)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: For A Few Duncans More: While using Chef's fancy new copier, Duncan accidentally makes an entire other Duncan. Great! But things go badly when the other Duncan decides to copy himself too. (S2 Ep19)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: He Who Wears The Clown: After trying on the nose of a clown, Owen learns that this is how clowns are made. He's stuck as a clown until he can trick someone into asking to try on the nose. (S2 Ep20)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Countdown: Grizzy finds a vintage stopwatch in the garage which lets you wind back the minute that has just passed by, and it can even stop time and movement in one's surroundings. (S1 Ep34)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemming Airlines: Grizzy is disturbed in the middle of his snack by a strange flow of objects that have been transformed into hot air balloons. (S1 Ep35)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Relax Bear: Grizzy discovers with that the ranger has purchased a new recliner. But even an armchair designed for relaxation can be used for other purposes by the Lemmings! (S1 Ep36)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Gliding: The Lemmings kite surf with a homemade kite. Grizzy decides to make a kite that is far more sophisticated than the Lemmings' kite to win she-bear's affection. (S1 Ep37)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Sound of a Lemming: Grizzy snatches the last jar of chocolate spread out from under the noses of the Lemmings. In exchange, he offers them the toy stuck inside the lid: a mini-flute. (S1 Ep38)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear in the Wind: The Lemmings play a new game but interrupt Grizzy watching his favourite TV show. (S1 Ep39)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Construction Bear: Grizzy decides to build a building to impress she-bear. (S1 Ep40)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Kung Fu Lemmings: The Lemmings draw inspiration from lessons they find in a martial arts book and start breaking every wooden object they can get their hands on. (S1 Ep41)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: A Midsummer Bear's Dream: Grizzy dreams that he's a valiant knight but is woken up by the Lemmings blasting music. Grizzy has only one desire: pick up his dream where he left off. (S1 Ep42)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Encore'tney: When Courtney turns to a magical datebook to help her achieve perfection, she's trapped in a never-ending loop until a friend teaches her a valuable lesson. (S2 Ep48)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Life Of Pie: When Izzy, Jude and Owen accidentally bring a pizza to life they do everything they can to help it find a new purpose in life, other than being eaten. (S2 Ep49)

programme.title: Mermicorno: Starfall
programme.desc: Epic Fail: Astra crafts a faulty talisman, putting Squishella and Gwen in a situation that's too close for comfort. (S1 Ep108)

programme.title: Unicorn Academy
programme.desc: The Broken Gem: The Sapphires try everything to prevent Sophia and Ava from fighting, but they've got bigger problems: two dastardly henchmen are after the grimstone. (S1 Ep6)

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty
programme.desc: The Boaracle: The Boaracle, a boar who claims to predict the future, makes a series of predictions about Miguel that all come true. (S1 Ep25)

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty
programme.desc: Out Of The Box: When Felicity goes viral doing fun unboxing videos, a jealous Rudy slips Pandora's Box into her scratching post house. (S1 Ep26)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Last Mom Standing: When Chef's mum and Leshawna's grandmother drop their loved ones off at the same time, it kicks off a dangerous competition for who is the most caring mother figure. (S3 Ep6)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Carmageddon: Duncan is rattled when Chef, tired of having his car destroyed, buys a new one that is completely indestructible. (S3 Ep7)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Sugar & Spice & Lightning & Frights: Two new kids show up at the daycare. Duncan and Leshawna take issue with not what makes them different, but what makes them similar to the newbies. (S3 Ep8)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Breaking Bite: Beth becomes the big dog on campus after she bites Duncan, but being the big dog is a dangerous thing, especially when you didn't actually bite anybody! (S3 Ep9)

programme.title: Mermicorno: Starfall
programme.desc: A Song of Ice and Fire Noodles: When Gwen loses her ice powers from eating spicy ramen, she takes desperate measures to get them back. (S1 Ep109)

programme.title: Unicorn Academy
programme.desc: Ravenzella's Revenge: As the academy teachers gear up to battle a powerful foe, they forbid their students from leaving the dorms. But one rider doesn't follow the rules. (S1 Ep7)

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty
programme.desc: Rudy Awakening: It's Eggtober and Rudy is scared everyone will discover he's lying about being related to the Easter Bunny. (S1 Ep35)

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty
programme.desc: Bound To Be Friends: Felicity and Miguel are stuck together by magical friendship bracelets that will only unlock if they prove they're really best friends. (S1 Ep36)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: A Bridgette Too Far: As season three draws to a close, Bridgette becomes desperate to star in an episode. (S3 Ep52)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Robo Teacher: When a substitute teacher fills in for Chef, Duncan thinks it's going to be the best day ever. He's wrong. (S2 Ep1)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Glove Glove Me Do: Owen's newly found gloves make him great at everything. But this greatness comes at a high price. (S2 Ep2)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Tooth About Zombies: Gwen's favourite event, the Zombie March, falls on the same day as Beth's nightmare event, dental check-up day. The two girls find a way to help each other out. (S2 Ep3)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Lie-ranosaurus Wrecked: Owen pretends to be Izzy's pet dinosaur after leading her to believe she dug him up in the school playground. (S2 Ep4)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: An Egg-stremely Bad Idea: Hoping to 'brighten her day,' Izzy and Owen revamp Gwen's egg chair. (S2 Ep5)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Exercising The Demons: When a severe screen addiction makes the kids lazy, Chef brings in a professional to whip them into shape. (S2 Ep6)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Pudding The Planet First: After Chef says opposing viewpoints make the world more interesting and fun, Izzy applies it in the worst way possible. (S2 Ep7)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Supply Mum: When Chef's mum becomes the supply teacher for a day, Duncan replaces Chef's to-do list with one of his own. (S2 Ep8)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Mooshy Mon Mons: After eating Chef's extremely rare and expensive chocolates, Courtney drags Owen, Izzy and Beth all the way to the Norberian Alps of Fruffenberg to replace them. (S2 Ep9)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Student Becomes The Teacher: Chef is knocked unconscious right before a school board evaluator shows up for a big review. Now Owen has to fill in so Chef doesn't lose his teaching licence. (S2 Ep10)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Beth And The Beanstalk: After having a chocolate bar confiscated by Chef, Beth finds herself in a parallel giant world and aims to get back her now giant chocolate bar. (S2 Ep11)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Bad Seed: Chef introduces the kids to agriculture by teaching them how to grow plants from seeds. But when Izzy shows her seed too much love, it turns into a monster! (S2 Ep44)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: A Fish Called Leshawna: After eating some mystery fish sticks, Leshawna achieves every little girl's dream and transforms into a mermaid! (S2 Ep45)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Double Oh Beth: With most of the class already gone for spring break, a villain infiltrates the school. Luckily a sleeper agent has been lying in wait. Hold on... it's Beth?!? Oh boy... (S2 Ep46)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: A Hole Lot of Trouble: When rain derails an outside game of catch, someone suggests they play inside. This prompts Izzy to lead the group through her wildly imaginative worst case scenario. (S3 Ep17)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: A Tall Tale: After Owen's BBF, Noah, goes through a growth spurt, Owen fears losing his friend and takes drastic action. (S3 Ep18)

programme.title: Power Players
programme.desc: The Thing In The Wall: Things are disappearing from Axel's room. Everything points to Galileo, but he claims that he hears noises in the walls. Let the investigation begin! (S1 Ep44)

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindiau

programme.title: Annibendod

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Guto Gwningen a'i ffrindiau. The animated tales of a little bunny and his friends.

programme.title: Help Llaw

programme.title: Sali Mali
programme.desc: Dywed Sali Mali wrth ei ffrindiau am beidio ag ofni'r wenynen sy'n suo o'u cwmpas, ond mae Jaci Soch yn ei gwylltio a chaiff ei golio ar ei ben-ôl! This time, the friends encounter a bee!

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Dyw Pablo ddim yn gwybod pam fod y cwt newydd yn yr archfrarchnad yn ei wneud mor anghyfforddus. Pablo doesn't understand why the new hut in the supermarket makes him so uncomfortable.

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach Ni
programme.desc: Heddiw: ymweliad â gwlad sy'n llawn coedwigoedd glaw trofannol a mynyddoedd hudol: Periw. Peru: We learn about the history of the Incas, about 'Machu Picchu' & an animal called a Vicuna.

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Mae Moc Samson yn galw i chwarae gemau fideo, ond mae'n rhaid i'r Jetlu fynd i'r afael â Peredur Plagus. Moc calls over to play video games with Joni but the Jetlu have to deal with Peredur.

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Pontybrenin sy'n ymuno â Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Pontybrenin join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: New: Stwnsh Sadwrn Byw
programme.desc: Jack, Leah, Lloyd, Jed a Cadi sy' yn stiwdio Stwnsh Sadwrn gyda llond lle o gemau, LOL-ian ac ambell pei Stwnsh! Jack, Leah, Lloyd, Jed and Cadi are in the Stwnsh Sadwrn studio for more fun.

programme.title: Y 'Sgubor Flodau
programme.desc: Tro hwn, mae aelodau ac arweinwyr Côr Arwyddo Lleisiau Llawen Caernarfon am ddiolch i'w harweinydd am sefydlu'r côr. This time: a floral thanks to the founder of Côr Arwyddo Lleisiau Llawen. [SL]

programme.title: Dim Byd i Wisgo
programme.desc: Tasg heddiw? Ffeindio gwisg addas ar gyfer parti plu, a'r iâr sydd angen sylw yw Gemma - athrawes nofio o Gaerffili, sy'n fam i Ella, un oed. Today, we need an outfit for a special hen! [SL]

programme.title: Codi Pac
programme.desc: Geraint Hardy sy'n 'Codi Pac' ac yn ymlwybro o gwmpas Cymru. Y brifddinas, Caerdydd, sy'n serennu yr wythnos hon. Join Geraint Hardy as he discovers what Cardiff has to offer this time. [SL]

programme.title: Richard Holt: Yr Academi Felys
programme.desc: Amser i ddathlu a dysgu sgiliau choux, gan gynnwys sut i greu patisserie eiconig: y Paris Brest! In their latest kitchen test, the bakers get a handle on choux pastry and also celebrate! [SL]

programme.title: Sgorio: Y Drenewydd v Aberystwyth
programme.desc: Gêm fyw o'r Cymru Premier JD rhwng Aberystwyth a'r Drenewydd. C/G 12.45. Live football match from the JD Cymru Premier between Aberystwyth Town and Newtown. K/O 12.45.

programme.title: Gwladfa: Gwilym Bowen Rhys
programme.desc: Y tro ma, mae Gwilym yn croesi'r paith ac yn cyrraedd y gymuned Gymraeg yng Nghwm Hyfryd. This time, Gwilym's journey takes him across the plain and to the Welsh community of 'Cwm Hyfryd'. [SL]

programme.title: Llond Bol o Sbaen: Chris yn Mallorca
programme.desc: Mae antur fwyd Sbaenaidd Chris yn parhau ym Mallorca gyda chwmni'r Chef seren Michelin, Tomos Parry, a'r actor Elen Rhys. Chris' Spanish food adventure continues on the island of Mallorca. [SL]

programme.title: Cymru Wyllt Gudd
programme.desc: Am y tro cyntaf, mae technoleg camera arloesol yn dadorchuddio dirgelion byd natur Cymru dan y lloer. Nature series: swimming hedgehogs, fishing bats, super moons & more. [SL]

programme.title: Rygbi Ewrop: Gweilch v Lyon
programme.desc: Gweilch v Lyon yn Rownd 8-Olaf Cwpan Her Ewrop yn fyw o Stadiwm Swansea.com. Ospreys v Lyon in the Quarter-final of the European Challenge Cup live from the Swansea.com Stadium. K/O 17.30.

programme.title: Newyddion a Chwaraeon
programme.desc: Newyddion a chwaraeon y penwythnos. Weekend news and sport.

programme.title: Am Dro!
programme.desc: Heddiw fydd Elliw, Rhys, Dilys a Leo yn mynd a'r criw am dro i Gapel, o gwmpas Penarlag, i Rymni, ac o Aberogwr i Ddwn-rhefn. We explore Capel, Hawarden, Rhymney, & Ogmore to Southerndown.

programme.title: Canu Gyda Fy Arwr: Aled Jones
programme.desc: Cyfle i berson lwcus i berfformio gyda'i harwr. Yr arwr dan sylw y tro hwn yw'r tenor byd-enwog o Fôn, Aled Jones. The hero this time is the world famous tenor from Anglesey, Aled Jones.

programme.title: Curadur
programme.desc: Tyrchu drwy archif Recordiau Sain yng nghwmni'r cynhyrchydd a DJ hip-hop, Don Leisure. We meet the legendary characters behind the songs DJ Don Leisure sampled on his record, 'Tyrchu Sain'.

programme.title: Priodas Pum Mil
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, awn ar daith i Gretna Green yn yr Alban lle ma pobl wedi bod yn dianc iddo i briodi ers 1754. We road trip to Gretna Green to help Daniel and Sara from Dyffryn Nantlle get wed.

programme.title: Y Tyrchwyr gyda Iolo Williams
programme.desc: Mae llawer o brysurdeb ond sut mae'r tyrchwr enwocaf un - y wahadden - yn setlo? The burrows are crowded and the mammals are busy. But how is the mole settling down?

programme.title: Cymylaubychain
programme.desc: Mae Baba Melyn yn anghofus iawn heddiw. Sut y daw hi o hyd i'r holl bethau mae wedi eu colli? Baba Melyn (Baba Yellow) is very forgetful today. How will she find all the things she's lost?

programme.title: Ne-wff-ion
programme.desc: Mae Lwsi'n ymweld â theulu sy'n addysgu eu plant gartre, a'r gwersi yn cynnwys dysgu am wenyn, mêl, a gwneud cloc haul. On Newffion today Lwsi visits a family that home-teach their children.

programme.title: Shwshaswyn
programme.desc: Beth yw'r holl bethau ar y bwrdd? Papur, glud a rhubanau. Gyda rhain, mae Seren yn dysgu am origami, mae'r Capten yn dysgu am y glud a Fflwff yn creu hunan-bortread. Seren learns origami!

programme.title: Fferm Fach
programme.desc: Mae Hywel y ffermwr hud yn tywys Betsan ar antur i Fferm Fach i ddod o hyd i arlleg fel bod hi'n gallu pobi bara garlleg. Hywel and Betsan seek garlic so that she can bake garlic bread.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae'r ffrindiau yn mwynhau diwrnod allan yn y goedwig! When one of Huwcyn's prized possessions gets lost, the friends must help him find it.

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Heddiw, mae Meg yn gofyn 'Pam bod cymylau gyda ni?' Mae Tad-cu'n ateb efo stori am ei Ddad-cu e, oedd yn hedfan cymylau'r byd i achub anifeiliaid! Today, Meg asks 'What are clouds for?'

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Meleri a'r criw yn cyfeiriannu ym Mharc Craig y Nos, ac fe fydd Alys a'i ffrind Mila yn gwersylla. Today, Huw and Elan will be surfing in Caswell Bay.

programme.title: Blero'n mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Pan fydd Blero'n helpu Rheinallt i bobi mae pethau'n mynd o chwith wrth iddo gael y mesuriadau'n anghywir. A spot of baking with Rheinallt goes awry when Blero gets the quantities wrong!

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Mae Ben Dant ar antur newydd i ailgylchu, a throi sbwriel yn sbeshal, a gwastraff yn gampwaith. Ben Dant joins the pupils of Ysgol Gynradd Gymraeg Lon Las, Swansea, to create a treasure.

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae Crawc yn falch iawn o'i hamog newydd ond yn gwrthod gadael i'w ffrindiau gael tro ynddo. Toad shows off his new hammock but refuses to let anyone else have a nap in it.

programme.title: Deian a Loli
programme.desc: Dyw Deian ddim yn deall pam fasa Loli eisiau treulio amser ar ei phen ei hun yn darllen yn lle chwara! Deian doesn't understand why Loli wants to spend time alone reading, and not playing.

programme.title: New: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Twm Twrch heddiw, tybed? What's happening in Twm Twrch's world today?

programme.title: Kim a Cai a Cranc
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Kim a Cai ar antur hudolus a chwareus wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am gragen newydd i Cranc! Join Kim and Cai on a magical adventure as they search for a new shell for Cranc!

programme.title: New: Penblwyddi Cyw
programme.desc: Os wyt ti'n dathlu dy ben-blwydd, dyma gyfle i ti weld dy lun ar Cyw. If you're celebrating your birthday, you may be lucky enough to see your photo on today's Cyw!

programme.title: Y Cosmos
programme.desc: Rhaglen sy'n datgelu rhai o gyfrinachau'r blaned fwyaf yn ein system solar - Y Blaned Iau. The secrets of the planet Jupiter and how every living thing exists because of it.

programme.title: Guinness World Records Cymru 2025
programme.desc: Ymdrechion i dorri recordiau Guinness World Records Cymru 2025: menywod cryf yn tynnu Injan, blodau diri, raff trapeze, a mwy! We follow attempts to break Guinness World Records Cymru 2025.

programme.title: Priodas Pum Mil
programme.desc: Ry' ni yn Sir Fôn yn trefnu priodas Meg a Luke. Ma gan Luke, efo help Trystan, rywbeth fyny ei lawes sy'n rhoi dipyn o sioc i Emma a Meg! We're in Anglesey organising Meg and Luke's wedding.

programme.title: Ty Ffit
programme.desc: Mae'r chwaraewr rygbi byd-enwog Shane Williams yn treulio amser yn 'Ty Ffit' penwythnos yma. World-famous rugby player Shane Williams spends time with the five in the house this weekend.

programme.title: 3 Lle: Ffion Dafis
programme.desc: Ffion Dafis sy'n ein tywys i 3 lleoliad o'i dewis: Dolwyddelan, glannau'r Fenai a'r A470. Ffion Dafis takes us to Dolwyddelan, the Menai Straits and along the infamous A470.

programme.title: Pen Llyn Harri Parri
programme.desc: Wrth grwydro ei filltir sgwâr daw'r awdur Harri Parri i ddargnafod rhai o straeon mwyaf arswydus Pen Llyn. As he explores the Llyn Peninsula, Harri Parri discovers the area's scary stories.

programme.title: Byd Eithafol Neo-Nazis yn Ein Plith
programme.desc: Y newyddiadurwr Maxine Hughes sy'n ymchwilio i'r bechgyn Cymraeg sy'n cael eu radicaleiddio gan neo-Nazis. We look into the number of teenage boys being groomed and radicalised by neo-Nazis.

programme.title: Cefn Gwlad
programme.desc: Cwrddwn â thair cenhedlaeth sy'n troi'r tir ar fferm fynydd Defaidty yng Nghwmtirmynach Bala. We meet 3 generations of the same family who farm the land at Defaidty, Cwmtirmynach, Bala

programme.title: Pobol y Cwm Omnibws
programme.desc: Rhifyn omnibws yn edrych nôl ar ddigwyddiadau yng Nghwmderi dros yr wythnos ddiwethaf. Omnibus edition looking back at events in Cwmderi over the past week. With onscreen English subtitles.

programme.title: Sgorio: Caerdydd v Llansawel
programme.desc: Gêm fyw o Brif Adran Genero yn Stadiwm Dinas Caerdydd gyda Chaerdydd v Llansawel. C/G 17.00. Live Genero Adran Premier football match with Cardiff v Briton Ferry Llansawel. K/O 17.00.

programme.title: Newyddion a Chwaraeon
programme.desc: Newyddion a chwaraeon y penwythnos. Weekend news and sport.

programme.title: New: Dechrau Canu Dechrau Canmol
programme.desc: Dathlwn Sul y Blodau gan ddysgu am draddodiadau Cymreig yr wyl. We celebrate Palm Sunday in Montgomeryshire; hymns from Capel y Tabernacl, Llanfyllin, and a performance by Siwan Henderson.

programme.title: New: Cynefin
programme.desc: Bydd Heledd, Iestyn a Ffion yn cyrraedd Bro Dysynni - ardal sy'n cuddio tu ôl i lethrau mynydd Cadair Idris rhwng Machynlleth a Dolgellau. We discover more about beautiful Bro Dysynni.

programme.title: New: Bariau
programme.desc: Ail gyfres. Wrth i Barry geisio cadw rheolaeth ar y wing, mae dyfodiad aelodau staff newydd yn gwneud bywyd yn anodd. Second series. Barry tries to keep control of the wing against all odds.

programme.title: Gogglebocs Cymru
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Tudur Owen a'i ffrindiau - hen a newydd - i chwerthin a chrio a dadlau dros deledu'r wythnos o Gymru a thu hwnt. Gogglebocs Cymru is back on the sofa!

programme.title: New: Molly Palmer: Endo a Fi
programme.desc: Mae'r DJ a'r cyflwynydd Molly Palmer, sy'n dioddef o endo, yn darganfod mwy am y salwch hwn - y diagnosis, y driniaeth, a mwy. DJ & presenter Molly Palmer finds out more about endometriosis.

programme.title: Welsh Whisperer: Ni'n Teithio Nawr
programme.desc: Llangeitho sy'n cael sylw tro ma, a chaiff y Welsh Whisperer glywed hanes Daniel Rowland a thwf y Methodistiaid yng Nghymru. We're in Llangeitho, meeting local historian Dafydd Iolo Jones.

programme.title: Hot Money
programme.desc: 2001. Crime Drama. Directed by Terry Winsor. Stars Caroline Quentin, Melanie Hill & Georgia Mackenzie. Three women plot to steal thousands of pounds from the Bank of England's incinerators. [S]

programme.title: The Caller
programme.desc: 1987. Mystery. Directed by Arthur Allan Seidelman. Stars Malcolm McDowell & Madolyn Smith. One night, a strange visitor finds his way into the home of a lone woman and an odd mind game begins. [S]

programme.title: Her First Affair
programme.desc: 1932. Drama. Director: Allan Dwan. Stars Ida Lupino in her debut, George Curzon & Diana Napier. A story of a young girl who falls in love with a novelist & is cured by his wife falling for her fiancé

programme.title: Time To Remember
programme.desc: Some People of the Thirties. 1964. Narrated by Anthony Quayle. A presentation of the famous personalities of the 30s, including Charlie Chaplin, George Bernard Shaw and H.G. Wells. [S]

programme.title: Dick Tracy (1945)
programme.desc: 1945. Action. Director: William Berke. Stars Morgan Conway, Anne Jeffreys, Mike Mazurki. Police detective Dick Tracy must identify and apprehend a serial killer known as 'Splitface'.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: The Case of the Violent Suitor. 1955. Stars Ronald Howard, Howard Marion-Crawford & Archie Duncan. Advice columnist 'Aunt Lottie' is at risk after advising a woman to break up with her fiancee. [S]

programme.title: Black Saddle
programme.desc: 1959. A Case of the Slow. Western with Peter Breck. After his brothers are killed in a shootout, a gunfighter decides to hang up his guns and uphold the law by becoming a lawyer.

programme.title: Space Patrol
programme.desc: The Shrinking Spaceman. 1963. Stars Murray Kash, Ronnie Stevens & Dick Vosburgh. When the Galasphere crew is sent to repair a transmitter on Pallas, Husky succumbs to a strange shrinking disease. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The Clock King Gets Crowned. 1966. Stars Adam West & Walter Slezak. The Clock King invades Wayne Manor to steal back a mistakenly rigged clock and attempts to rob Bruce's pocket watch collection. [S]

programme.title: Richard the Lionheart
programme.desc: School for a King. 1962. Stars Dermot Walsh, Peter Illing, David Davies. Determined to learn more about his realms and the plight of his subjects, Richard sets out for the countryside in disguise. [S]

programme.title: Phantom Creeps
programme.desc: The Iron Monster. 1939. Stars Bela Lugosi, Dorothy Arnold & Robert Kent. Spies capture and question reporter Jean. [S]

programme.title: Operation Third Form
programme.desc: 1966. Adventure. Directed by David Eady. Stars John Moulder-Brown & Derren Nesbitt. Children save a junk collector from being accused of theft and prevent someone from stealing a painting. [S]

programme.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
programme.desc: The Charm Pedlar. 1960. Stars Richard Greene, Victor Maddern, John Arnatt. Robin goes undercover as a conman in an attempt to expose a crooked charm pedlar but ends up in trouble with the Sheriff. [S]

programme.title: Battle Beyond The Sun
programme.desc: 1962. Sci-fi. Directed by Mikhail Karyukov, Aleksandr Kozyr & Francis Ford Coppola. Stars Edd Perry & Arla Powell. In the distant future, two rival nations race to be the first to land on Mars. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life How do you Swing?
programme.desc: 1964. An eye opening look into how research into the golfer's swing is progressing, with a look at what is involved in the swing of the golf club from a physiological and physical viewpoint.

programme.title: One Step Beyond
programme.desc: The Dream.1959. Starring Reginald Owen, Richard Lupino and Mollie Roden. Separated by WW2, a husband and wife both dream that their partner is in danger, but is it just a dream? [S]

programme.title: Dick Barton: Special Agent
programme.desc: 1979. Writer: Clive Exton. Dick's Aunt (Stella Kemball) tells him that her house has vanished. Richard Marley reveals that Harold Jenkins (Peter Godfrey) has perfected his ultimate weapon.

programme.title: Fireball XL-5
programme.desc: Robert to the Rescue. 1963. Stars David Graham, Sylvia Anderson & John Bluthal. Steve and Venus take Professor Matic to a new planet the professor spotted with his new telescope.

programme.title: Captain Scarlet and the Mysterons
programme.desc: Model Spy. 1967. Stars Sylvia Anderson, David Healy & Gary Files. The Mysterons target a French fashion designer, who is secretly the Controller of the European Area Intelligence Service in Paris.

programme.title: Three Crooked Men
programme.desc: 1959. Crime. Director: Ernest Morris. Stars Gordon Jackson, Sarah Lawson, Warren Mitchell. A shopkeeper is taken hostage when 3 crooks break into his shop to drill through to the bank next door. [S]

programme.title: The Four Feathers (1978)
programme.desc: 1978. Drama. Directed by Don Sharp. Stars Beau Bridges, Robert Powell & Jane Seymour. Lieutenant Faversham dishonours his regiment and loses his fiancée, but can he regain his honour and his love? [S]

programme.title: Z-Cars
programme.desc: Ringers. 1976. Stars George Baizley, Antony Carrick, Todd Carty, John Collin & Rosalind Elliot. In detection you need routine and instinct. But not necessarily in that order. [S]

programme.title: A Family At War
programme.desc: For Strategic Reasons. Created by John Finch. Stars Keith Drinkel & Prunella Ransome. Excerpts from previous episodes tell the story of Phillip Ashton and his touching wartime romance. [S]

programme.title: Crooks In Cloisters
programme.desc: 1964. Comedy. Director: Jeremy Summers. Stars Barbara Windsor, Bernard Cribbins, Melvyn Hayes. After pulling off the smallest train robbery, Little Walter and his crew decide to get out of London. [S]

programme.title: Up Pompeii
programme.desc: 1971. Comedy. Directed by Bob Kellett. Stars Frankie Howerd, Patrick Cargill & Michael Hordern. A Roman slave inadvertently possesses a scroll which details a plot against the Emperor Nero. [S]

programme.title: Arizona Dream
programme.desc: 1993. Drama. Director: Emir Kusturica. Stars Johnny Depp, Faye Dunaway, Vincent Gallo. A young New Yorker goes to Arizona for a wedding and becomes intertwined in the lives of two eccentric women. [S]

programme.title: Arizona Dream
programme.desc: 1993. Drama. Director: Emir Kusturica. Stars Johnny Depp, Faye Dunaway, Vincent Gallo. A young New Yorker goes to Arizona for a wedding and becomes intertwined in the lives of two eccentric women. [S]

programme.title: The Treasure of San Teresa
programme.desc: 1959. War. Director: Alvin Rakoff. Stars Eddie Constantine, Dawn Addams, Marius Goring, Christopher Lee. Ex-serviceman, Larry, returns to Europe to retrieve jewels hidden from the Nazis in 1944. [S]

programme.title: Out of Town
programme.desc: Sheep Farming and Bite Indicators. 1980. Jack Hargreaves visits one of the largest sheep farms in the south of England. Then he goes fishing on the Dorset Stour to try two types of bite indicator. [S]

programme.title: Topper Returns
programme.desc: 1941. Mystery. Directed by Roy Del Ruth. Stars Joan Blondell, Roland Young & Carole Landis. A young woman returns as a ghost after being murdered and seeks help from Topper to find the killer. [S]

programme.title: The Rossiter Case
programme.desc: 1951. Drama. Directed by Francis Searle. Stars Helen Shingler, Clement McCallin & Sheila Burrell. After an accident results in her paralysis, a woman fears that her husband will abandon her. [S]

programme.title: Glencannon: The Loving Cup
programme.desc: 1959. Comedy. Stars Thomas Mitchell & Patrick Allen. A wonderful episode of the rare series about the adventures of Colin Glencannon, the chief engineer of the freighter Inchcliffe Castle. [S]

programme.title: The Adventures of PC 49
programme.desc: 1949. Crime. Directed by Godfrey Grayson. Stars Hugh Latimer, John Penrose & Annette D. Simmonds. A policeman goes undercover to infiltrate a gang of thieves trading stolen tobacco and whisky. [S]

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Elly's First Date. 1962. Stars Donna Douglas, Louis Nye & Harriet E. MacGibbon. Mr. Drysdale convinces his self-absorbed stepson to date Elly May, while Granny and Jed prepare for Thanksgiving. [S]

programme.title: The Ghost Train
programme.desc: 1941. Comedy Horror. Director: Walter Forde. Starring Arthur Askey, Richard Murdoch & Kathleen Harrison. High jinks and chills ensue when a group of people become stranded at an isolated station. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The Clock King Gets Crowned. 1966. Stars Adam West & Walter Slezak. The Clock King invades Wayne Manor to steal back a mistakenly rigged clock and attempts to rob Bruce's pocket watch collection. [S]

programme.title: City of Bad Men
programme.desc: 1953. Western. Directed by Harmon Jones. Stars Jeanne Crain, Dale Robertson & Richard Boone. After six years in Mexico, an outlaw returns to Nevada, with a plan to rob the Carson City prize-fight. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Girls of the Air
programme.desc: 1963. Travel the world with the members of the Women's Royal Air Force, including Dame Anne Stephens, Air Commandant Jean Conan Doyle, senior radar technician Carole Nicholson, and Mary McGurk.

programme.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
programme.desc: The Truce. 1960. Stars Richard Greene, John Arnatt & Richard Caldicot. In a bid to win a wager with Lord Repton, the Deputy Sheriff negotiates with Robin to represent him in an archery contest. [S]

programme.title: Out of Town
programme.desc: Fly Casting/The Log Splitter. 1986. Jack Hargreaves illustrates the technical advances in fly fishing. He then shows us his latest gadget for chopping logs for his wood burning stove. [S]

programme.title: The Footage Detectives
programme.desc: Mike and Noel have everything from the lovely Debbie Reynolds to the bizarre world of The Alberts! There's also a superb reel of the last Maidstone Trolley Bus! And do you remember Beetle Drives? [S]

programme.title: The Captain's Paradise
programme.desc: 1953. Comedy. Directed by Anthony Kimmins. Stars Alec Guinness, Yvonne De Carlo, Celia Johnson & Miles Malleson. The Captain of a ferry boat between Gibraltar & Morocco has a woman in each port. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life High Living
programme.desc: 1968. A fascinating look at the space needed to house the rising population in Britain, including the benefits and problems involved with high rise living.

programme.title: Gideon's Way
programme.desc: The Alibi Man. Stars John Gregson Alexander Davion and Daphne Anderson. A racing car driver accidentally kills his accountant over some missing money. [S]

programme.title: The Wheeltappers and Shunters Social Club
programme.desc: Episode 20. 1975. Roger Whittaker and Saffron perform 'New World In The Morning', 'The Seasons Come and the Seasons Go', and Helen Shapiro performs 'Lean On Me'. [S]

programme.title: Budgie
programme.desc: Pair of Charlies. Stars: Adam Faith, Iain Cuthbertson & Lynn Dalby. Budgie gets blown up-and let down. Based on a storyline by Jack Trevor Story. [S]

programme.title: Spanish Fly
programme.desc: 1976. Comedy. Director: Bob Kellett. Stars: Leslie Phillips, Terry-Thomas, Graham Armitage. A businessman is trying to shoot an ad for his company's new line of lingerie when he encounters a rival.

programme.title: The Heritage Chart Show with Mike Read
programme.desc: A TOTP style TV Show for Heritage Artists based on the Heritage Chart which is voted on in over 80 countries. Songs you love from popular artists, live and on video with the odd interview.

programme.title: Bubble's Hotel

programme.title: Hello Kitty: Super Style!

programme.title: Hello Kitty: Super Style!

programme.title: Hello Kitty: Super Style!

programme.title: Hello Kitty: Super Style!

programme.title: Hello Kitty: Super Style!

programme.title: Masha And The Bear

programme.title: Masha And The Bear

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Unfriended?: Red or yellow? Masha and the Bear argued which colour is more beautiful, and a wall grew between them. All this turns into exhausting competition of searching new friends. (S6 Ep8)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Shower Power: When forest orderlies are powerless, dealing with a real epidemic is not an easy task. But Masha gets down to business, the main thing is perky laughter! (S6 Ep9)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
